titleStmt.title: Analysis. The loosing of St. Peters bands; : setting forth the true sense and solution of the covenant in point of conscience so far as it relates to the government of the church by episcopacy. / By John Gauden ...
titleStmt.author: Gauden, John, 1605-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Best, for Andrew Crook, at the Green-Dragon in St. Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: First word of title in Greek characters.
"Books written by Dr. Gauden, and sold by Andrew Crook ..." ([1] p. at end).
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.

place.placeName: the Green-Dragon in St. Pauls Church-yard.
